search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Scoro (scoro.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Scoro is: [https://www.scoro.com/pricing/](https://www.scoro.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Free 14-day trial, no credit card required.

**Everything in Performance, plus:**

*   Company budgets & forecasts
*   Time locking
*   Approval flows
*   WIP report
*   Multi-account reporting
*   Periodization of invoice lines
*   Single sign-on
*   User provisioning

[Show all features](https://www.scoro.com/pricing/#comparison)

Onboarding
----------

Our Onboarding Experts have worked with hundreds of businesses worldwide. They will help you set up your Scoro site, optimize your team’s workflow and get your company fully on board. Alternatively, you can choose a partner from our [directory](https://www.scoro.com/partner-directory/) to assist with consultation on change management, implementation, training and integration.

Up to 15 people

### Self-Onboarding

You set up your site and onboard your team independently with our help materials.

**This plan includes:**

*   Self-onboarding guides
*   Video tutorials
*   Product tours

Up to 15 people

### Assisted

You set up Scoro independently, with our experts at hand for on-demand consultations.

**This plan includes:**

*   Self-onboarding guides
*   Video tutorials
*   Product tours
*   Up to five 1-hour Q&A sessions
*   5 hours of e-mail consultations

15-49 people

### Professional

Our experts help you establish your workflows, set up the site and manage the change.

**This plan includes:**

*   Requirements mapping session
*   Scoro workflow consultations
*   Guided site configuration
*   Guided data migration
*   End-user training sessions

50+ people

### Custom

Our experts tailor the onboarding service to your unique needs.

Disclaimer: Scoro subscription, pricing, packages and onboarding services are provided subject to the Scoro [Terms of Use](https://www.scoro.com/terms-of-use/). Capitalized terms on this website shall have the meaning set out in the Scoro [Terms of Use](https://www.scoro.com/terms-of-use/).

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Is Scoro for my company?

Scoro is a cloud-based work management software solution for professional and creative services. Scoro eliminates silos and simplifies professional services delivery through a single, unified platform. With complete visibility over your entire operation, including clients, projects, resources, financials, and business intelligence, you’re able to better execute, elevate client satisfaction, improve financial performance, and more easily forecast revenue and resource needs.

Can I try before I buy?

How does your pricing work?

Scoro is a tiered subscription service, so the pricing depends on the number of people in your team as well as the plan that suits you the best.

Is there a minimum user count?

Yes, the minimum number of user seats for all packages is 5.

Which plan is right for me?

Get an overview of the plans and offered features by checking out the plans’ comparison table above. Should you need any help figuring that out, our [Consultants](mailto:sales@scoro.com) would be more than happy to help!

How long will it take to get up and running?

That depends on the size of your team and company, and your requirements. For most of our customers getting fully up and running with Scoro takes from a few days up to a few weeks – that includes importing your data (contacts, invoices, etc.), and getting to know the system.

How does your onboarding work?

Our Onboarding team helps you with all aspects of getting started with Scoro and we are happy to tailor the onboarding package to your exact needs and business processes. An onboarding package may include help on setting up the site, business process mapping, help on importing data, help on setting up integrations, training for your team, etc. See more info about the onboarding packages [here](https://www.scoro.com/pricing/#onboarding).

According to Scoro’s Onboarding team: _“We’ve helped hundreds of companies in using Scoro and working more efficiently. When we’re doing team trainings for Scoro’s users, we can solve the questions and issues right away and show the new users all the tips and tricks on how to use the system.”  
_

What is self-onboarding?

The free self-onboarding package is available for teams of up to 15 people. You are free to use the self-onboarding materials such as videos and articles in our [Help Center](https://help.scoro.com/) to set up your Scoro site. Self-onboarding is not suitable for teams of 15+ people – with bigger teams you will require our onboarding experts to help you set up your Scoro site, optimize your team’s workflow and get your entire company fully on board to get the most out of Scoro. Please note that the self-onboarding materials are only available in English.

Self-onboarding package is for you if:

• You are tech-savvy and feel confident about setting up the site by yourself using the self-onboarding materials in our Help Center.

• You have figured out the best workflow for your company and don’t need further in-person consultation on that.

• You have less than 15 people in your team. As soon as you have confirmed your payment plan, we will send over the first tips and tricks for self-onboarding.

Can I import my existing data?

Yes, you can import your own contacts, products, images, invoices, receipts, and more.

How do you offer support?

There’s a ton of useful support articles and videos available at our [Help Center](https://support.scoro.com/). We also have a dedicated [Customer Support](mailto:help@scoro.com) team in place that is happy to help you with any questions – feel free to [email](mailto:help@scoro.com) them, or if you’d prefer to have a chat with one of our Support Specialists, you can request a call-back by dialing +44 203 808 3300.

How can I find a partner to assist us with our implementation?

Contact any of our [implementation partners](https://www.scoro.com/partner-directory/) to tailor a custom onboarding service for your company. Then contact your Scoro consultant to confirm your selection of partner and to finalize your subscription plan.

I have other questions! Who can help me?

If you have any questions about Scoro or the sign-up process please send us a [note](mailto:help@scoro.com). We look forward to hearing from you!

#### Get a demo

See how Scoro can help deliver projects and improve your profitability.

[Book a demo](https://www.scoro.com/demo/)

or

#### Start a free trial

Tour the product and try Scoro for free for 14 days, no credit card required.

[Try for free](https://www.scoro.com/pricing/#)

Take a look at our list of plans and prices available to fit your teams' needs. Get started for free. No credit card required.
